name: Namco Museum Arcade Pac
summary:
All the best Namco arcade games in the palm of your hand. 
 
Save your quarters and bring the arcade home with the ultimate two-in-one game ‘pac,’ Namco Museum Arcade Pac! Enjoy the nostalgic classics in Namco Museum and the flashy maze madness of Pac-Man Championship Edition 2 Plus with friends or solo, at home or on the go, for exciting arcade fun wherever you are—exclusively for the Nintendo Switch.

esrb.synopsis: This is a collection of 20 Namco arcade games, including classics such as Dig Dug, Galaga, Sky Kid, and Pac-Man. Several games depict 2D arcade-style gameplay and graphics. One horror-themed game (Splatterhouse) depicts a slasher-character using meat cleavers, chainsaws, and shotguns to kill fantasy creatures (e.g., zombies, ghouls); in some environments, creatures appear with red blood drips/splatters, and a handful of enemies can be decapitated or dismembered. A spy game (Rolling Thunder 2) depicts a stylized image of a nude woman covered in blue silhouette; while the outline of her breasts are visible, there are no discernible details (i.e., no nipples).
